data.text: Yake babarima Agur nsɛm a ɔkaeɛ a ɛyɛ nkɔmhyɛ:
“Me na mennim hwee koraa wɔ nnipa mu,
Mensuaa nyansa,
Hwan na waforo akɔ soro na wasiane aba fam?
“Onyankopɔn asɛm biara yɛ nokorɛ;
Mfa biribi nka nʼasɛm ho,
“Ao Awurade, nneɛma mmienu na mehwehwɛ firi wo nkyɛn;
Yi atorɔ ne ahohwisɛm firi me mu;
Anyɛ saa a, ebia menya me ho pii ama mapa wo
“Nsɛe ɔsomfoɔ din nkyerɛ ne wura;
“Nnipa bi dome wɔn agyanom,
Wɔn a wɔtene wɔ wɔn ankasa ani so
wɔn a wɔn ani tra ntɔn,
wɔn a wɔn se yɛ akofena
“Amemem wɔ mmammaa mmienu
Damena,
“Ani a ɛyi agya ahi,
“Nneɛma mmiɛnsa na ɛyɛ me nwanwa,
Ɛkwan a ɔkɔdeɛ nam so wɔ ewiem,
“Ɔbaa waresɛefoɔ ɛkwan nie:
“Nneɛma mmiɛnsa na ɛma asase woso,
akoa a wabɛyɛ ɔhene,
ɔbaa a wɔmmpɛ no na wawareɛ,
“Nneɛma nketenkete ɛnan na ɛwɔ asase so,
Ntɛtea yɛ abɔdeɛ nketewa a wɔnni ahoɔden,
Nkukuban30.26 Nkukuban yɛ nnanko mu ahodoɔ bi a, wɔtena akuakuo wɔ mmepɔ mu.—yɛ abɔdeɛ a wɔnni ahoɔden,
ntutummɛ nni ɔhene,
wɔtumi de nsa kyere ɔkoterɛ,
“Nneɛma mmiɛnsa na wɔwɔ aberempɔn nanteɛ,
gyata, mmoadoma ɔhene a, biribiara mmɔ no hu;
akokɔnini a ɔretutu taataa,
“Sɛ woayɛ ɔkwasea ama wo ho so,
Sɛdeɛ wɔka nufosuo nu mu a sradeɛ firi mu ba
